thread.title: 1 killed, 1 wounded in South Side shooting - Chicago Tribune
thread.title_full: 1 killed, 1 wounded in South Side shooting - Chicago Tribune

author: Chicago Tribune Staff
title: 1 killed, 1 wounded in South Side shooting - Chicago Tribune
text:
1 killed, 1 wounded in South Side shooting 1 Killed, 1 wounded on the South Side Eric Clark / Chicago Tribune 
A 45-year-old man was shot and critically wounded in the 2400 block of East 75th Street in the South Shore neighborhood, Feb. 12, 2017. The man suffered gunshot wounds to the face and neck and was taken to Northwestern Memorial Hospital, where he later died. A 54-year-old man was also wounded in the same attack with a gunshot wound to the right thigh.
